name: Directory
description: A directory within a unit catalogue

content.name: print_name
content.description: the user-friendly name of this directory

content.name: sub_list_width
content.description:
the width of the List part's sub-list
default: 100.0

content.name: in_development
content.description:
whether this directory and its contents should be considered to be still under development or not
default: false
